candidates.why: Same CLI-mode documentation generation family: gemini->qwen->codex fallback, batching, and similar phase structure (plan -> execute -> verify).
Same change-detection + approval gate + batching pattern; differs mainly in artifact target (CLAUDE.md updates vs docs tree).
Oracle command doc for this command; use as truth source during gap analysis (no-leak spec).
Similar orchestration structure but full-scope updates rather than related-only updates.
Good reference for CLI invocation + allowed-tools frontmatter conventions (AskUserQuestion + Bash).

selected.why: Closest in behavior and structure while still being a different command, making it a strong non-regression reference.
